dimension:
2 3/4 x 2 5/8 in. (6.99 x 6.67 cm) (sheet, irregular)
14 1/2 x 11 1/2 in. (36.83 x 29.21 cm) (outer frame)
markings: LLQ, in black: [S (or IS?)]; on back: Fine Arts Gallery of San Diego exhibition label
medium: Pen and brown ink on paper
provenance: [Walter Schatzki, New York]. Sale, Santa Barbara Museum of Art, Santa Barbara, December 4, 1972, for $354.38, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1972-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Soap or Soup Makers
